meanings.definition: A wild pig found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The bushpigs roamed freely in the African savanna.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of bushpigs foraging for food in the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The bushpigs decided to have a dance party in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The bushpigs were like little explorers in the vast wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The loud grunts of the bushpigs echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: Many bushpigs were spotted near the watering hole.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the behavior of the bushpigs in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The bushpigs threw a surprise birthday party for the elephants.
meanings.sent4: The bushpigs, with their striped coats, stood out among the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The bushpigs' playful antics entertained the onlookers.
